title: 作业~~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2014-3-4 22:26 编辑 

几天前老师叫我写我和一本书有什么关联...


1. I have changed my name a little. My Chinese name is 马赛克.  This is difficultfor American so I am called 马赛克. This is like River Boy changing his name to Tall Boy.  2. Respect is very important in my culture.  Bright Morning lost respect when she left thesheep in the storm.  Now she what's achance to prove herself and gain respect. I to must show respect to father andgrandparents by what I do. 3.   Bright Morning lovesthe beauty of the land with its high mesas and river gorges. I too have been toplaces like this when I went to the Grand Canyon.  I too thought it was beautiful


闲着无聊啦水一下~~

马赛克是我的名字...
[groupid=500]绅士交流团~~[/groupid]

replies.author: 红石大神
replies.txt_content:
1。我已经改变了我的名字一点点。我的中国名字叫马赛克。这是difficultfor美国，所以我叫马赛克。这就好比河男孩改变了他的名字，以高大的男孩。 
2。尊重是非常重要的，我的文化。明媚的早晨失去了尊重，当她在暴风雨中留下thesheep。现在，她有什么有的机会来证明自己，赢得尊重。我到要表示尊重父亲andgrandparents由我做什么。 
3。明媚的早晨lovesthe美丽的土地，其高台地和河谷。我也一直这样toplaces的时候我去了大峡谷。我也认为这是美丽的
以上由谷歌翻译提供= =
